label: controlRequirementIndicator
comment: The indication of whether or not a control is required for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The indication of whether or not this acknowledgement document has a control requirement.
The indication of whether or not this exchanged document has specific control requirements.
The indication of whether or not this referenced document requires a control.

domainIncludes.comment: A document exchanged between parties for a business application level acknowledgement of the receipt of information.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
A set of formal steps to satisfy a cross-border regulation, law or convention.
